mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(ns_start_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ns_start_dt ,TO_CHAR(ns_end_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ns_end_dt FROM NOTSALES_DATE WHERE product_seq=#{product_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC} UNION SELECT TO_CHAR(checkin_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ns_start_dt ,TO_CHAR(checkout_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ns_end_dt FROM RESERVATION WHERE product_seq = #{product_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND reserv_status =0

SELECT m.MEMBER_First_NAME ||' '|| m.MEMBER_LAST_NAME member_name , r.* FROM RESERVATION r , MEMBER m WHERE r.product_seq = #{product_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND r.reserv_status=0 AND r.member_id = m.member_id
